problem.markdown:
>>Anaerobic decomposition produces a potent greenhouse gas called:<< () oxygen () carbon monoxide () ozone (x) methane () CFC
[explanation] Methane, a potent greenhouse gas with a global warming potential of 25, is produced by anaerobic decomposition, which occurs in waterlogged fields, landfills and other wet locations. [explanation]
problem.p: Anaerobic decomposition produces a potent greenhouse gas called:

choicegroup.label: Anaerobic decomposition produces a potent greenhouse gas called:

div.p: Methane, a potent greenhouse gas with a global warming potential of 25, is produced by anaerobic decomposition, which occurs in waterlogged fields, landfills and other wet locations.
